entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 09:28 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 except minus 17 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10 except minus 17 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 09:28 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:28 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
